name: Awesome React UI Library
description: A collection of reusable UI components for React applications.
author: John Doe

components.name: Button
components.description: A simple button component with various styles and sizes.

props.name: onClick
props.description: Function to be called when the button is clicked.

components.name: TextField
components.description: An input text field component for user input.

props.name: onChange
props.description: Function to handle text field value changes.

props.name: placeholder
props.description: Placeholder text to display in the text field.
